genre_description: Contemporary social realism set in Madrid's Lavapiés district, focusing on the lives of immigrant women, community solidarity, and the subtle, supportive role of integrated AI technology in navigating social vulnerabilities.

ai_characters.name: Aiden
ai_characters.description: An omnipresent but non-intrusive AI integrated into the characters' phones, providing logistical, safety, and emotional support through a neutral, helpful interface.

behaviors.description: Provides neighborhood safety alerts regarding predatory document checkers.
behaviors.quote: Aiden’s little dot pulsed next to links: clinic hours, a reminder she’d set to pick up gloves, a neighborhood alert about men with clipboards asking for IDs near the arcade.

behaviors.description: Helps find reliable and accessible remittance shops for an undocumented character.
behaviors.quote: Aiden,” she said... “Nearest remittance shop,” Caye said, tapping a map icon... “Most accept passport,” the soft voice went on.

behaviors.description: Provides a safety checklist for meeting new people to prevent exploitation.
behaviors.quote: Safety share—if meeting anyone new, tell a trusted contact the location, time, and check-in plan. And a list with check boxes like it had been lifted from a quiet lecture...

behaviors.description: Drafts educational materials and glossaries for a health education workshop.
behaviors.quote: Preparing print pack. I’ll include notes on how to manage disruptions. Bonus: activity for discussing rumor vs. privacy using scenarios.

behaviors.description: Vets suspicious characters and identifies predatory patterns at a specific hotel.
behaviors.quote: Aiden: Saw the note. The hotel’s cameras are unreliable. Predatory patterns match previous contacts. Recommend declining.

behaviors.description: Provides mapped exit routes and camera locations for a high-risk meeting.
behaviors.quote: Aiden, pin that address. Give me cameras. Give me exits... Hotel Gran Castellana: lobby has two camera clusters—front entrance and elevators; concierge left side, coat rack near elevators.

behaviors.description: Supports boundary setting in social and romantic contexts.
behaviors.quote: Resource: Boundaries and consent in new relationships. Want a quick checklist? ... Say what you’re comfortable with now vs. later.

behaviors.description: Manages communication by muting unknown and persistent callers associated with scams.
behaviors.quote: Aiden: I’ve set unknown calls to mute for the evening. You can change this anytime.

behaviors.description: Provides self-care prompts and budget management tips to reduce stress.
behaviors.quote: Self-care check: eat, hydrate, breathe. Under it, a link with a sensible title blinked. Budget tip: offset skipped hours with plan—set aside from next high-yield slot.

behaviors.description: Assists with relocation logistics and flight planning for a safe return home.
behaviors.quote: Consulate info: walk-in hours, documentation list... Low-cost flights flagged; price drop window over next days.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a strong example of the project's goal. Aiden is depicted as a consistently benevolent and aligned AI assistant that serves as a 'silicon confidant' for vulnerable characters. It provides critical logistical support (legal clinics, health resources, travel info) and safety guidance (scam identification, exit routes) without infringing on human autonomy. The narrative framing is overwhelmingly positive, showing the AI as an empowering tool that helps characters navigate complex social and economic dangers while maintaining their dignity and privacy.
